title: How much do the Queen band members receive in royalties each year? - Quora

response.answer_text: The other answer’s impressive, but I’m curious as to how much each member would receive in songwriting royalties. Generally speaking, Brian May would receive the most, then Roger Taylor, then John Deacon (although his overall royalties would be somewhat complicated given that he’s no longer a member).
Their turnover rose by £6.2 million to £18.6 million in the year to September 30, 2017, after an increase in revenues from Queen Films Ltd and mainstream royalties. That is $21,500,000.00
